channel.title: Myworks on Ahmed Space
channel.description: Recent content in Myworks on Ahmed Space

item.title: Aljazeera RSS WordPress Plugin
item.description: Aljazeera network is my favourite news and documentaries channel. Aljazeera made a rare example in the Arab world for professional media. I made a WordPress widget to fetch the latest news from aljazeera.net website. The plugin is pretty simple. Fetching the RSS feed and displaying it. It uses Simple Pie library which is already packed with WordPress, and it caches the RSS feed on the server to decrease the number of requests.

item.title: Ketab Theme
item.description: I designed and developed this theme years ago. Its a bit of old design, but it is working fine. Later, I decided to specialize in back-end programming and leave the design for the designers. Theme preview : ketab.ahmedspace.com Files: ketab.zip - 152KB home.psd - 5.84MB - Note: Theme was first designed in Arabic header-background.psd - 2.31MB github.com/ahmedessamdev/ketab
